𒀸 𒈬 𒂠 Uno me sam' : I am alone

𒆳 𒂠 Kurshan mountains
𒆳 𒂠 Kurubit mountains

𒆳 𒂠 𒉌 𒁺 𒌦
Kurshan an ĝen me.
I go to the mountains.

𒆳 𒂠 𒉌 𒁺 𒌦
Kur 'san go me.
I go to the mountains.

𒌷 𒂠 𒉌 𒁺 𒂊
Urban an go I.
Ur bean go Wo.
I go to the city.
